title: Regis Prograis has to remove his UNDERWEAR to make 10st limit during weigh-in
text:
Regis Prograis had to remove his underwear in order to make the 10st limit ahead of his fight against Josh Taylor on Saturday night.

Taylor, meanwhile, tipped the scales at 9st 13lbs ahead of their world super-lightweight title bout.

Prograis is expecting an explosive finish to the fight which has the Muhammad Ali Trophy on the line.

Regis Prograis had to remove his underwear in order to make the 10st limit ahead of his fight

The fight will take place at the O2 Arena where Prograis will put his WBA 'Super' title on the line

'Somebody's throwing that towel in because I'm going to stop him guaranteed,' vowed Prograis after trading insults with his rival during the stare-down.

'Everything is good, I'm going to beat the s*** out of him tomorrow.

'We were cursing each other, I was saying I was going to stop him, he was saying he was going to stop me.

'It's going to be a bloody fight I'm sure.'

The fight will be contested at the O2 Arena where Prograis will put his WBA 'Super' title on the line against IBF champion Taylor.
description: Regis Prograis had to remove his underwear in order to make the 10st limit ahead of his fight against Josh Taylor on Saturday night. Taylor meanwhile tipped the scales at 9st 13lbs.
